register.name: FPCAR_S
register.description: Holds the location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

bitField.name: ADDRESS
bitField.description: Address

register.name: FPCAR_NS
register.description: Holds the location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

bitField.name: ADDRESS
bitField.description: Address

register.name: FPCAR
register.description: Holds the location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

bitField.name: ADDRESS
bitField.description: Address

register.name: FPCCR_S
register.description: Holds control data for the Floating Point Unit

bitField.name: ASPEN
bitField.description: When this bit is set to 1, execution of a floating-point instruction sets the CONTROL.FPCA bit to 1

bitField.name: LSPEN
bitField.description: Enables lazy context save of FP state

bitField.name: LSPENS
bitField.description: This bit controls whether the LSPEN bit is writeable from the Non-secure state. This behaves as RAZ/WI when accessed from the Non-secure state

bitField.name: CLRONRET
bitField.description: Clear floating point caller saved registers on exception return

bitField.name: CLRONRETS
bitField.description: CLRONRET Secure only

bitField.name: TS
bitField.description: Treat FP registers as Secure enable

bitField.name: UFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the UsageFault exception to pending

bitField.name: SPLIMVIOL
bitField.description: This bit is banked between the Security states and indicates whether the FP context violates the stack pointer limit that was active when lazy state preservation was activated. SPLIMVIOL modifies the lazy FP state preservation behaviour

bitField.name: MONRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the DebugMonitor exception to pending

bitField.name: SFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the SecureFault exception to pending. This bit is only present in the Secure version of the register, and behaves as RAZ/WI when accessed from the Non-secure state

bitField.name: BFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the BusFault exception to pending

bitField.name: MMRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the MemManage exception to pending

bitField.name: HFRDY
bitField.description: Indicates whether the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame was able to set the HardFault exception to pending

bitField.name: THREAD
bitField.description: Indicates the processor mode when it allocated the FP stack frame

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Security status of the FP context. This bit is only present in the Secure version of the register, and behaves as RAZ/WI when accessed from the Non-secure state. This bit is updated whenever lazy state preservation is activated, or when a floating point instruction is executed

bitField.name: USER
bitField.description: Indicates the privilege level of the software executing when the processor allocated the FP stack frame

bitField.name: LSPACT
bitField.description: Indicates whether lazy preservation of the FP state is active

register.name: FPCCR_NS

register.name: FPDSCR_S
register.description: Holds the default values for the floating-point status control data that the PE assigns to the FPSCR when it creates a new floating-point context

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding mode

register.name: FPDSCR_NS
register.description: Holds the default values for the floating-point status control data that the PE assigns to the FPSCR when it creates a new floating-point context

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding mode

register.name: FPDSCR
register.description: Holds the default values for the floating-point status control data that the PE assigns to the FPSCR when it creates a new floating-point context

bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding mode

register.name: MVFR0
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point Extension

bitField.name: FPRound
bitField.description: Floating-point rounding modes

bitField.name: FPSqrt
bitField.description: Floating-point square root

bitField.name: FPDivide
bitField.description: Floating-point divide

bitField.name: FPDP
bitField.description: Floating-point double-precision

bitField.name: FPSP
bitField.description: Floating-point single-precision

bitField.name: SIMDReg
bitField.description: SIMD registers

register.name: MVFR1
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point Extension

bitField.name: FMAC
bitField.description: Fused multiply accumulate

bitField.name: FPHP
bitField.description: Floating-point half-precision

bitField.name: FPDNaN
bitField.description: Floating-point default NaN

bitField.name: FPFtZ
bitField.description: Floating-point flush-to-zero

register.name: MVFR2
register.description: Describes the features provided by the Floating-point Extension

bitField.name: FPMisc
bitField.description: Floating-point miscellaneous

tcf:enumItem.description: Executing an FP instruction has no effect on CONTROL.FPCA
tcf:enumItem.name: Executing_an_FP_instruction_has_no_effect_on_CONTROL

tcf:enumItem.description: Executing an FP instruction sets CONTROL.FPCA to 1
tcf:enumItem.name: Executing_an_FP_instruction_sets_CONTROL

tcf:enumItem.description: Disable automatic lazy context save
tcf:enumItem.name: Disable_automatic_lazy_context_save

tcf:enumItem.description: Enable automatic lazy context save
tcf:enumItem.name: Enable_automatic_lazy_context_save

tcf:enumItem.description: LSPEN is readable and writeable from both Security states
tcf:enumItem.name: LSPEN_is_readable_and_writeable_from_both_Security_states

tcf:enumItem.description: LSPEN is readable from both Security states, but writes to LSPEN are ignored from the Non-secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: LSPEN_is_readable_from_both_Security_states_but_writes_to_LSPEN_are_ignored_from_the_Non_secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: The CLRONRET field is accessibly from both Security states
tcf:enumItem.name: The_CLRONRET_field_is_accessibly_from_both_Security_states

tcf:enumItem.description: The Non-secure view of the CLRONRET field is read only
tcf:enumItem.name: The_Non_secure_view_of_the_CLRONRET_field_is_read_only

tcf:enumItem.description: Not able to set the UsageFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_able_to_set_the_UsageFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Able to set the UsageFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Able_to_set_the_UsageFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: The existing behavior is retained
tcf:enumItem.name: The_existing_behavior_is_retained

tcf:enumItem.description: The memory accesses associated with the floating point state preservation are not performed. However if the floating point state is secure and FPCCR.TS is set to 1 the registers are still zeroed and the floating point state is lost
tcf:enumItem.name: The_memory_accesses_associated_with_the_floating_point_state_preservation_are_not_performed

tcf:enumItem.description: Not able to set the DebugMonitor exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_able_to_set_the_DebugMonitor_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Able to set the DebugMonitor exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Able_to_set_the_DebugMonitor_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Not able to set the BusFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_able_to_set_the_BusFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Able to set the BusFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Able_to_set_the_BusFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Not able to set the MemManage exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_able_to_set_the_MemManage_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Able to set the MemManage exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Able_to_set_the_MemManage_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Not able to set the HardFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_able_to_set_the_HardFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Able to set the HardFault exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Able_to_set_the_HardFault_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Handler mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Handler_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Thread mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Thread_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Indicates the FP context belongs to the non-secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: Indicates_the_FP_context_belongs_to_the_non_secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Indicates the FP context belongs to the secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: Indicates_the_FP_context_belongs_to_the_secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Lazy state preservation is not active
tcf:enumItem.name: Lazy_state_preservation_is_not_active

tcf:enumItem.description: Lazy state preservation is active
tcf:enumItem.name: Lazy_state_preservation_is_active

tcf:enumItem.description: All rounding modes supported
tcf:enumItem.name: All_rounding_modes_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: 16 Ã— 64-bit registers
tcf:enumItem.name: _16_64_bit_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: Half-precision to single-precision implemented
tcf:enumItem.name: Half_precision_to_single_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Half-precision to single and double-precision implemented
tcf:enumItem.name: Half_precision_to_single_and_double_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Propagation of NaN values supported
tcf:enumItem.name: Propagation_of_NaN_values_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Full denormalized numbers arithmetic supported
tcf:enumItem.name: Full_denormalized_numbers_arithmetic_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Selection, directed conversion to integer, VMINNM and VMAXNM supported
tcf:enumItem.name: Selection_directed_conversion_to_integer_VMINNM_and_VMAXNM_supported
